history.text: You should watch Catch Me if You Can. It is a great movie.
Really? What makes it a great movie?
It was given a 96% by Rotten Tomatoes
That's not bad. Who's in the movie?
It also has some great actors like Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks and Christopher Walken.
What's it about?
It is based on the life of Frank Abagnale (Leonardo DiCaprio). Before he is 19, he performs all these cons worth millions of dollars by posing as a pilot, a doctor and a parish prosecutor.
That sounds interesting. Is it more of a drama or an action movie?
It is more of a comedy. It is funnier than about 90% of the comedies found in theatres today.
Might check it out. What's the running time of the movie?
It is 140 min long.
Not too long, When'd it come out?

It came out in 2002. 
The reason he starts all of this is because is parents fall on hard times. They lose their home and then get divorced. He runs away from home and runs out of money. That's when all the cons start.
Sounds worth watching. I'll have to check it out.
You really should. He steals over $2.8 million.
You want more facts?
So, I'm guessing there's some element of truth to the movie?
There is. It is based on a true story. He is so good at it that the FBI actually comes to him to get help catch people that forge checks.
Cool....Who directs the film?
Steven Spielberg.
He does get caught.
Always a quality sign....Is it Amblin entertainment or did some other studio release it?
Not completely sure.
No worries. So is it a family friendly movie?
It is.
What's the film rated?
I am not completely sure.
No worries....I'll have to keep an eye out for it next time it's showing somewhere.
Yep. Frank winds up working for the FBI rather than do 12 years in prison.
I'm sold...Cool plot and you can never go wrong with a Tom Hanks film.
I agree.

uid1response.feedback:
A good overview of the film was provided, along with information on what type of film it was, who the film stars and who directed.

Always nice to also know running time and how the film was received critically.

uid2response.feedback: Pretty good conversation. A little slow but still good.
